DOC.brief_title: Iressa Radiotherapy Treatment Locally Advanced Inoperable Squamous Cell Carcinoma Head Neck
DOC.criteria: Histologically Confirmed locally advance Squamous Cell Carcinoma Head neck At least one measurable tumour lesion No previous treatment chemotherapy , radiotherapy and/or surgery Carcinoma Head Neck No coexist malignancy malignancy diagnose within last 5 year exception basal cell carcinoma cervical cancer situ Any evidence severe uncontrolled systemic disease ( e.g . unstable uncompensated respiratory , cardiac , hepatic renal disease )
DOC.keyword: Inoperable locally advanced Squamous Cell Carcinoma Head Neck
